MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: IMobileServiceTable<TodoItem> todoTable = client.GetTable<TodoItem>();
GET /tables/todoitem?$filter=(complete+eq+false) HTTP/1.1
SELECT * FROM TodoItem WHERE ISNULL(complete, 0) = 0
SELECT * FROM TodoItem WHERE ISNULL(complete, 0) = 0 AND ISNULL(text, 0) = 0
List<TodoItem> items = await todoTable .Where(todoItem => todoItem.Complete == false) .Where(todoItem => todoItem.Text != null) .ToListAsync();
query = query.IncludeTotalCount();
// This query filters out the item with the ID of 25 TodoItem item25 = await todoTable.LookupAsync(25);
await todoTable.InsertAsync(todoItem);
await todoTable.UpdateAsync(todoItem);
await todoTable.DeleteAsync(todoItem);
